author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Quick check via VesselFinder shows Millennial Spirit having vanished from AIS while underway in “zone of operations” 3 days ago, Namura Queen disappearing while underway about 11 hours ago some distance S of Odessa after having briefly anchored off Odessa on the 25th after what looked like a normal approach via VTS, Yasa Jupiter at anchor in a location in Turkey (Dilovasi) making recent attack pretty unlikely.

So one likely, one “hmm,” one not likely.

One is too many.

author: Craig Northacker
content: Adolf Putin is now just another punk war criminal. Hopefully the Ukrainians can defeat the invaders and Putin will be deposed. They are putting up a strong fight and the US is supplying more Javelins to use against Russian armor.
